response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price slightly below its true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions.", "product_price": 1100000}
